extendedIngredients.name: whipped cream
extendedIngredients.originalString: Vanilla ice cream or whipped cream

recipes.title: Great Pumpkin Dessert
recipes.instructions: Directions                                                                                In a large bowl, beat first five ingredients until smooth.                                                                                            Transfer to a greased 13-in. x 9-in. baking dish. Sprinkle with cake mix and drizzle with butter. Top with walnuts.                                                                                            Bake at 350° for 1 hour or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean. Serve with ice cream or whipped cream.                                        Yield: 12-16 servings.                                                                                                                         Originally published as Great Pumpkin Dessert in  Quick CookingSeptember/October 1999, p12                                                                                                                                                                                                        Nutritional Facts                                                                             1 serving (1 piece) equals 385 calories, 21 g fat (8 g saturated fat), 70 mg cholesterol, 326 mg sodium, 44 g carbohydrate, 3 g fiber, 8 g protein.                                                                                                                                                                     Print                                                                                    Add to Recipe Box                            Email a Friend

steps.step: In a large bowl, beat first five ingredients until smooth.
Transfer to a greased 13-in. x 9-in. baking dish. Sprinkle with cake mix and drizzle with butter. Top with walnuts.
Bake at 350° for 1 hour or until a knife inserted near the center comes out clean.
Serve with ice cream or whipped cream.
